definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Dian4 ying3 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: Lets go to the cinema together, and Ill call for you.
sentences.chinese: 咱們一起去看電影吧，到時候我來叫你。

sentences.english: I finished watching the movie The Proposal this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，我看完了電影《假結婚》。

sentences.english: It is now the highest-grossing independent British film of all time.
sentences.chinese: 如今，這已成爲迄今爲止最成功的英國獨立電影。

sentences.english: The film about the death of a young child was one that really tugged at my heartstrings.
sentences.chinese: 這部描寫一個小孩之死的電影真讓我揪心。

sentences.english: And the fourth one is currently called Into the Wild Green Yonder.
sentences.chinese: 第四部電影的名字暫定爲《荒野綠林的彼端》。

sentences.english: The film is an American version of a two thousand eight French thriller called "Pour Elle."
sentences.chinese: 這部電影是一個二千八法語稱爲“倒艾莉。”

sentences.english: Damon combines his moviemaking talents with his desire to help others.
sentences.chinese: 戴蒙將製作電影的才能和幫助他人的慾望結合在一起。

sentences.english: We saw a film yesterday. Its name was Speed.
sentences.chinese: 我們昨天看了一場電影，片名是《生死時速》。

sentences.english: It's such a great film. The director took a lot of care while filming.
sentences.chinese: 電影很不錯，導演拍的時候很用心。

sentences.english: An edited version will also be played in movie theaters.
sentences.chinese: 剪輯版的短片也將在電影院上映。

sentences.english: Bacon still remains one of the top movie stars in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 而貝肯仍舊是好萊塢數一數二的電影明星。

sentences.english: Porridge has also been in some films.
The bad police officer in that movie thought he was above the law.
sentences.chinese: 那部電影中的壞警察自認不受法律的約束。

sentences.english: Children under 18 are not admitted to this film.
sentences.chinese: 未滿18歲的小孩不得入場看這部電影。

sentences.english: People stampeded from the burning cinema.
sentences.chinese: 人們從着了火的電影院裏紛紛逃出。

sentences.english: With the same as Hollywood, the star is the important insurance ofthe Hong Kong movie booking office.
sentences.chinese: 與好萊圬一樣，明星是香港電影票房的重要保證。

definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
